definition: variant of 梭鏢|梭镖[suo1 biao1]

mark/sign/label/to mark with a symbol, label, lettering etc/to bear (a brand name, registration number etc)/prize/award/bid/target/quota/(old) the topmost branches of a tree/visible symptom/classifier for military units

sentences.english: They trembled at the range of the peasant's spears.
sentences.chinese: 看到农民的梭标，他们阵阵发抖。

sentences.english: Missouri is the first state to allow use of an atlatl in its hunting season cycle.
sentences.chinese: 密苏里是第一个允许在狩猎季节使用梭标投射器的州。

sentences.english: They trembled at the sight of the peasant's spears.
sentences.chinese: 看到农民的梭标，他们阵阵发抖。

sentences.english: In ancient times, hunters usually used spears in hunting.
sentences.chinese: 古时候，猎人们打猎通常都要使用梭标。

definition: pitchfork/garden fork/restraining pole (used by police)/military fork (of ancient times)
ancient spear-like weapon, decorated with a red tassel
